select.id: ge広域運用識別コード情報の取得処理

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DbT1001."shikibetsuCode", DbT1001."shichosonCode" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" as DbT1001 WHERE DbT1001."shichosonCode" in #{code} AND DbT1001."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号}

SELECT DbT1001.* FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS DbT1001 WHERE DbT1001."hihokenshaNo" =#{hihokenshaNo} AND DbT1001."idoYMD" =#{idoYMD} ORDER BY DbT1001."hihokenshaNo" desc, DbT1001."edaNo" desc LIMIT(1)

SELECT
PSM.* FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" JOIN rgua.${psmShikibetsuTaisho} AS PSM ON DbT1001."shikibetsuCode" = PSM."shikibetsuCode" WHERE PSM."kanaMeisho"= #{カナ名称} AND PSM."seinengappiYMD" = #{生年月日} AND PSM."seibetsuCode" = #{性別コード}
